title: Even if you don’t need a new Mac, this blowout iMac deal is too good to pass up
content:
Macworld

The new M3 iMac may be faster than the original model, but otherwise, it’s the same great iMac we loved in 2021. And if you didn’t buy one then, you should grab one now: Best Buy is selling the M1 iMac in several configurations for up to $650 off.

Our favorite pick is the green model, which comes with a full 8-core GPU and 512GB of storage for just under $1,000, a whopping savings of $650. You can also get the same configuration in blue and silver for slightly more, $1,050. Finally, the same model with 256GB of storage is available in all colors for $900, good for $550 off the MSRP.

The M1 iMac has a gorgeous 24-inch 4.5K display and an incredibly thin design, with two Thunderbolt ports, two USB-C ports, and a six-speaker sound system. You’ll also get a color-matched Magic Keyboard with Touch ID and a Magic Mouse, which sell separately for $249, as well as a power adapter with built-in ethernet.

All in all you’re getting a fantastic display with a speedy Mac that’ll look great anywhere you put it. So go grab one before this deal is gone forever.
